Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Peoria
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Morgan, Marquette, Halsted & 69th, due to fire department activity near 69th/Peoria.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Morgan, Marquette, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 69th, due to fire department activity near 69th/Peoria.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a mechanical problem.

 Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
